mil7.2.8:5.1: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘cāpassa ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabban’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamaṃ taṃ ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabban”ti?
mil7.2.8:5.2: “Yathā, mahārāja, cāpo sutacchito namito yāvaggamūlaṃ samakameva anunamati nappaṭitthambhati;
mil7.2.8:5.3: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena theranavamajjhimasamakesu anunamitabbaṃ nappaṭipharitabbaṃ.
mil7.2.8:5.4: Idaṃ, mahārāja, cāpassa ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.2.8:5.5: Bhāsitampetaṃ, mahārāja, bhagavatā devātidevena vidhura (puṇṇaka) jātake—
